hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive Casting Manufacturing Solutions
hero.description: From design to delivery, we provide end-to-end manufacturing services.

items.title: Sand Casting
items.description: Ideal for larger, bulk components and structural parts with excellent dimensional accuracy and cost-effectiveness.

items.title: Die Casting
items.description: Precision parts with smooth surfaces and tight tolerances, perfect for complex geometric designs.

items.title: Investment (Lost-Wax) Casting
items.description: Advanced technique for intricate, detail-rich components with superior surface finish and minimal post-processing.

items.title: Gravity Casting
items.description: Suitable for medium-complexity parts requiring consistent material properties and structural integrity.

items.title: Centrifugal Casting
items.description: Specialized method for producing high-integrity rings, bushings, and sleeves with uniform microstructure.

items.title: Custom Tooling & Pattern Making
items.description: In-house pattern development for low- and high-volume production runs, ensuring precision and repeatability.
